'''''Parma Eldalamberon 1''''' is the first issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{PEnav|1|2}}

==Contents==
* Cover — Paula Marmor

* Columns
** "''Beth-Luis-Nion''" — Paula Marmor
** "Wondelone" — Jim Carleton
** "Tales from the Little Old Bookmaker" — Jim Vibber

* Articles
** "Haradrim & Sigelhearwan" — [[Robert Foster]]
** "A Glossary of Old Solar" — Joe R. Christopher
** "The One Inconsistency in LotR" — Robert Foster
** "On the Formation of Plurals in Sindarin" — [[Bill Welden]]

* Mathoms
* Runes (letters)
* [[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 1 backcover.png|Back cover]] — Janet Wainwright
